name: Playwright
description: Browser automation and end-to-end testing MCP server by Microsoft. Enables Claude to interact with web pages, take screenshots, fill forms, click elements, and perform automated browser testing workflows.
longDescription: Microsoft's Playwright MCP server for browser automation. Enables Claude to navigate pages, take screenshots, fill forms, click elements, and run end-to-end tests across Chromium, Firefox, and WebKit. Useful for testing workflows, scraping, and UI verification.
